tweet_text: "I'd love you if you looked like a rainbow vomited on you, you numpty," Jungkook mutters, and tries not to blush at the wildly smitten, besotted expression Taehyung's expression morphs into - like he thinks Jungkook is just about the most miraculous thing he's ever seen.

tweet_text:
@SasparillaTango @Orbitaldropkick System -> Mechanics -> Options -> Out of character decisionmaking -> in character decisionmaking (roleplay or in character interactions)

The system you are playing in provides a framework. You can think within the framework of the system. (allowed actions for PCs to take)
